i1.name: Spider Queen
description: {{sbc|Innate - Human Form:}} When '''Elise's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] hit a target she gains one dormant ''Spiderling'', up to {{passive progression/deprecated version|4|showtype=true|type = [[File:Elise OriginalSquare.png|20px|link=]] Human Form's Rank|2 to 5}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Spider Form:}} '''Elise's''' [[basic attack]]s against non-{{tip|turrets|structures}} deal {{passive progression/deprecated version|4|showtype=true|type = [[File:Spider Form.png|20px|link=]] Spider Form's Rank|10 to 40|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|heal}} her for {{passive progression/deprecated version|4|showtype=true|type = [[File:Spider Form.png|20px|link=]] Spider Form's Rank|4 to 10}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} [[On-hit effect|on-hit]].
i1.notes:
* '''Elise''' will always begin the game and respawn with maximum available ''Spiderlings'' stored.
* '''Elise's''' [[File:Elise OriginalSquare.png|Human Form|20px|link=Elise#Human Form|border]] [[Elise#Spider Form / Human Form|Human Form]] ability casts can only store one ''Spiderling'' each.
* The ''Spiderlings'' have a [[Pets#Leash ranges|leash range]].
* ''Spider Form's'' basic attacks will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the '''bonus''' damage does not).
** {{Pending for test}}: ''Spider Form's'' interaction with {{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, and {{tip|blind}}.
* Applies {{tip|proc damage}} on the bonus magic damage on-hit in spider form.
* The ''Spiderlings'' apply {{tip|area damage}}.
